page.title: 15Ingol Squash and Golf Club.
page.content: The pro is responsible for improving the play of club members.The course covers a large area of Ingol. The local housing estate takes its name from the club,being called the Ingol Golf Village. The Club house has many cabinets full of trophies for golf and squash. There are photos of the various captains for golf and squash.Most of the money is made on the golf course as many non-members come for a round of golf and a drink afterwards. The club is situated in a pleasant area but has a good deal of competition from the Preston Golf club and the Lea Golf Club,both of which are not more than eight miles away.
